neuralNetwork
Class Perceptron

java.lang.Object
  neuralNetwork.Perceptron
All Implemented Interfaces:
Neuron
Direct Known Subclasses:
LinearPerceptron, SigmoidPerceptron, SqRootPerceptron
public abstract class Perceptron
extends java.lang.Object
implements Neuron

A basic abstract perceptron that stores its inputs, weights, and output. It handles back propagation training. Subclasses must define the activation function and its derivative and the min and max output and weights.

Version:
1.05 - 16 August 2008
Author:
Amos Yuen
